item.description:
Somehow Scooters and Rockport seem like a natural mix, 2 great tastes and taste great together.

No doubt it will be mobbed with people, but if we pack a picnic and eat on the rocks I think it'd be great!

Road to Rockport: MAP

We will be stopping at Greater Boston Motorsports at 10:30 to see if I can get them to put my air filter in.

Bring food for yourself and a something extra for the group:

Lets try this:

If your zip code ends in an even number or zero bring a healthy snack to share like veggies or fruit

If your zip code ends in an odd number bring water, juice or soda

This needs to be a Yes or No event so everybody will know what to pack.

Hope you will join us!
item.how_to_find_us: At the Marriott, look for Scooters
item.why: C'mon, who can resist a ride to Rockport in the Summer.
item.name: Boston Big Iron: Rockport Run & Picnic
